title: Realm Descriptor
description: This is the Realm Descriptor schema, includes all public metadata about a realm.

publicKey.description: The public JWK of the Realm.

endpoints.description: Versioned API endpoints for the Realm, a map of URIs where version is the key.

inviteURL.description: The Invite URL for the Realm.

servicesURL.description: Location of where to find services published by the Realm.

icon.description: The location of the icon used for displaying the Realm.

banner.description: The location of the banner used for displaying the Realm.
